alert.note: Alert for Darke (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A RAPIDLY DEVELOPING THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN DARKE COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, a rapidly developing thunderstorm was located near Union City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Union City, Ansonia, Rossburg, State Route 47 at US Route 127, Sharps Crossing, Cosmos and Pikeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Residents in these areas should remain alert. If this storm becomes stronger, then a warning may be needed. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
